title.label: Love this game BUT HERE WHAT I THINK YALL NEED TO ADD

content.label:
1. More variety of decorations.
2. You should be able to sell decorations on Floydslist and / or trade them in between friends.
3. Larger variety of workers to pick up at bus stop and earn through karma contests.
4. Ability to purchase more land and expand your farm.
5.the option to customize workers you do earn. 
6. The first person you get on your farm should be you, right ? I want to be able to have my character on my farm and customize it and have it give you the option of like a mystery ability (for example: guano, mystery seeds, coins).
7. Whoever markets this game or like is the one behind it should spend more time investing in THIS game instead of newer ones like the festival one, I played it and found it boring.
8. You should be able to customize/ paint your grow house walls / floors/ pots at a certain level.
9. You should be able to trade out the raccoon in the grow house for a better one if you come upon it. 
10. There should be gizmos that give you pot bucks.
And yeah those are just my inputs on how I feel you could make this game better ‚ù§Ô∏èüôè‚úåÔ∏è My boyfriend and I play it often and I actually got him hooked on it and now he‚Äôs a higher level than me !

I‚Äôve loved this game for years I love the idea !!! However, it‚Äôs getting to a point that I‚Äôm not sure I even want to play anymore. I just played for over an hour and everything I did reset. Which happens sometimes but usually reset the past few mins not a whole hour. This was the first glitch that made me reconsider playing at all. Trust me. It glitches ALL the time. But usually it‚Äôs bearable and small glitches like restarting every time you open the app which is only about 30-50 seconds. But the app crashes every time I watch an ad to get a reward. So watching an ad for pot bucks no longer works at all so no chance for free pot bucks but watching ads for an emerald pot works most of the time even if the app crashes. I have honestly never in my life played a game that glitches this much. Also never seen an app completely crash and close so often. I couldnt even open the app for an entire day a few weeks ago. It‚Äôs unfortunate because I just spent $3 real money on the game. Maybe I can speak to the developer about a refund if the recent and more serious glitches continue. I love everything about this game (idea wise I hate the glitches obviously) but it‚Äôs getting to a point where it‚Äôs too frustrating to play. You have to put a LOT of work to advance in the game so why would I put in the time and effort if it‚Äôs going to get erased again? I‚Äôd like to believe this will stop but I‚Äôve been playing for years and the glitches have just gotten worse. Fingers crossed.
